titleStmt.title: [Y drydded rhan o waith. The third part of the works.]
titleStmt.author: Prichard, Rhys, 1579-1644.

notesStmt.note: 2000 microform ed. lacks t.p. and all after p. [76]; title information suggested by Wing.
Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: pages after p. [54] are severely mutilated; many are fragments.
Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales.
